content: Chess shackles its master, subduing his mind and brain in such a way that the inner freedom of even the strongest will suffer.
translations: ita:Gli scacchi incatenano il loro padrone, sottomettendo la sua mente e il suo cervello in modo tale che la libert√† interio
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
